ModMetaData.name: Gunplay - Forked
ModMetaData.author: AUTOMATIC,Twinki
ModMetaData.description: Adds more cinematic effects to ranged weapons: - Trails for projectiles - Weapon Animations for miniguns and bows - Adjust projectile origin - New project hit sounds - Weapon movement animation for pawns missing their targets - Visual effects for particle collision - Faster projectile speed for all projectiles - Adjustable mod settings
